column1: Set Yes to enable Sticky Header also on mobile view. If set to No, Sticky Header is enabled only on desktop view.
column2: Set Yes to enable Sticky Header also on mobile view. If set to No, Sticky Header is enabled only on desktop view.

column1:
If "Yes" you will be able to control the background and elements color on sticky header.
                        If "No" Sticky Header will use white background color and existing header color options.
column2:

                        If "No" Sticky Header will use white background color and existing header color options.
